name: redcap_cypress
description: This repository is a template to assist you in writing **automated tests for REDCap**.

scripts.about-these-scripts: These scripts are intended for a cloud environment, and do not currently make sense for local development where redcap_rsvc is a git checkout rather than a copy from node_modules.
scripts.clean: npm install && del-cli node_modules redcap_rsvc package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.redcap_rsvc:install: npm run clean && npm run redcap_rsvc:move_files
scripts.redcap_rsvc:move_files: del-cli cypress/fixtures/cdisc_files && del-cli cypress/fixtures/dictionaries && del-cli cypress/fixtures/import_files && move-cli node_modules/redcap_rsvc redcap_rsvc && cp -a redcap_rsvc/Files/* cypress/fixtures/
scripts.redcap_rsvc:validate_features: npm install gherkin-parse glob-fs --no-save --silent --ignore-scripts && node validate_feature_files.js
scripts.redcap_rsvc:single_test: CYPRESS_prettyEnabled=true npx cypress run --spec redcap_rsvc/Feature\ Tests/A/Configuration\ Check_1/A.1.1.0100.\ -\ Run\ Configuration\ Check.feature --browser chrome
scripts.redcap_rsvc:all_tests: CYPRESS_prettyEnabled=true npx cypress run --record --key $RECORD_KEY --parallel --group core-tests --browser chrome
scripts.rctf:test_server: npm run rctf:install_server && npm run rctf:run_server
scripts.rctf:run_step_tests: npm run rctf:get_step_features && npm run rctf:launch_tests
scripts.rctf:run_official_step_tests: npm run rctf:get_step_features && npm run rctf:official_tests
scripts.rctf:launch_tests: CYPRESS_prettyEnabled=true CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://localhost:6060 npx cypress run --env testMode=true --config specPattern=./cypress/features/tests/*/*.spec.feature --browser chrome
scripts.rctf:official_tests: npm run rctf:get_step_features && CYPRESS_VIDEO=false CYPRESS_prettyEnabled=true CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://localhost:6060 npx cypress run --env testMode=true --config specPattern=./cypress/features/tests/*/*.spec.feature --record --key $RECORD_KEY --group rctf-tests --browser chrome
scripts.rctf:write_step_tests: npm run rctf:get_step_features && CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://localhost:6060 npx cypress open --env testMode=true --config specPattern=./cypress/features/tests/*/*.spec.feature

author: Adam De Fouw
